articles.author: Steven Railston
articles.title: Erik ten Hag's Man United selection dilemma has been solved by accident - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Harry Maguire could return to the squad against Aston Villa, but Erik ten Hag has a simple decision to make in defence.
articles.content: When Raphael Varane and Lisandro Martinez sustained injuries this month, the door opened for Harry Maguire to make a statement. Manchester United's first-choice centre-backs had been sidelined and it… [+3146 chars]

articles.title: Yates Climbs The Thyon 2000 To Win Stage 4 Of The Tour de Romandie | Eurosport - Eurosport
articles.description: Through the cold and the rain, Adam Yates solos the 2000-metre mountain to take the yellow jersey ahead of the final stage.News and coverage from the #1 spor...
